医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究揭示了自合性对常见疾病风险的影响研究人员探索了自合性（以纯合性运行（FROH）中基因组的比例来衡量）与常见疾病之间的关联，重点关注近亲率高的人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/New-research-uncovers-autozygositys-impact-on-common-disease-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/New-research-uncovers-autozygositys-impact-on-common-disease-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1246986b-876a-42e8-afa6-585063566852 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 08:17:00 -0400 New research uncovers autozygosity's impact on common disease risks
新研究揭示了社会孤立如何影响社会物种的行为和寿命研究人员使用弓背蚁（木蚁）作为模型物种进行行为追踪和核糖核酸测序（RNA-seq），以研究社会孤立工蚁与群体工蚁之间的转录组水平差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/New-research-reveals-how-social-isolation-impacts-behavior-and-lifespan-in-social-species.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/New-research-reveals-how-social-isolation-impacts-behavior-and-lifespan-in-social-species.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30b5741e-1e25-4376-a460-4d243a62e673 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 07:24:00 -0400 New research reveals how social isolation impacts behavior and lifespan in social species
抗击癌症：对可预防和可治疗病例的综合评估研究人员介绍了一项在 185 个国家进行的基于人群的研究结果，该研究估计了 2020 年 36 种不同类型癌症导致的过早死亡人数，这是全球过早死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/The-fight-against-cancer-a-compressive-assessment-of-preventable-and-treatable-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/The-fight-against-cancer-a-compressive-assessment-of-preventable-and-treatable-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1767012b-b25b-4fa9-80e2-14392c5b6996 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 06:59:00 -0400 The fight against cancer: a comprehensive assessment of preventable and treatable cases
社会保障超额支付引起国会议员的审查和愤怒几位国会议员呼吁社会保障管理局对发放数十亿美元的款项负责，该管理局称受益人无权收到款项，然后又要求退还这笔钱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Social-security-over payments-draw-scrutiny-and-outrage-from-members-of-Congress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Social-security-over payments-draw-scrutiny-and-outrage-from-members-of-Congress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62ebdb34-d2b0-4a21-9abe-b7485086ba69 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 06:53:26 -0400 Social security overpayments draw scrutiny and outrage from members of Congress
这些阿巴拉契亚医院做出了巨大的承诺来获得垄断地位。他们未能交付。五年前，阿巴拉契亚这个蓝领角落的竞争对手医院公司达成了一项交易。如果州立法者允许它们合并，不留下任何竞争对手，医院承诺不会哄抬价格或偷工减料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/These-Appalachia-hospitals-made-big-promises-to-gain-a-monopoly-Theree28099re-failing-to-deliver.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/These-Appalachia-hospitals-made-big-promises-to-gain-a-monopoly-Thesee28099re-failing-to-deliver.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f29150a3-ea53-4891-b141-cde535f701cc Fri, 29 Sep 2023 06:41:58 -0400 These Appalachia hospitals made big promises to gain a monopoly. They’re failing to deliver.
STEMCELL Technologies 与 Science World 合作，为追求科学相关职业的女孩提供帮助加拿大最大的生物技术公司 STEMCELL Technologies 很高兴地宣布，它将成为温哥华科学世界女孩与 STEAM 峰会的展示合作伙伴。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/STEMCELL-Technologies-partners-with-Science-World-to-empower-girls-pursuing-science-lated-careers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/STEMCELL-Technologies-partners-with-Science-World-to-empower-girls-pursuing-science-lated-careers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d6c68ac-90c2-4110-b29b-4996e101a33f Fri, 29 Sep 2023 06:20:00 -0400 STEMCELL Technologies partners with Science World to empower girls pursuing science-related careers
研究发现，扩大 FDA 批准的癌症药物适应症需要大量患者新抗癌药物二次批准所需的患者参与者数量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Extending-FDA-approved-cancer-drug-indicates-requires-high- Patient-numbers-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Extending-FDA-approved-cancer-drug-indicates-requires-high- Patient-numbers-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=480fd968-f6b0-4c30-8d5b-1c5cecff2e4a Fri, 29 Sep 2023 06:08:00 -0400 Extending FDA-approved cancer drug indications requires high patient numbers, study finds
监测唾液代谢变化的传感器可快速诊断糖尿病用于无创测定唾液等体液中葡萄糖的传感器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Sensors-that-monitor-salivary-metabolic-changes-to-rapidly-diagnose-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Sensors-that-monitor-salivary-metabolic-changes-to-rapidly-diagnose-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98340f78-e5f9-46c4-bb08-df0ceb873ec4 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 05:27:00 -0400 Sensors that monitor salivary metabolic changes to rapidly diagnose diabetes
用于诊断创伤后应激障碍的人工智能模型人工智能是否可能成为创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）诊断的一种有前途的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Artificial-intelligence-models-for-diagnosing-post-traumatic-stress-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Artificial-intelligence-models-for-diagnosing-post-traumatic-stress-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f57e8d57-e42f-48d0-b77f-5ea3ef86493e Fri, 29 Sep 2023 04:42:00 -0400 Artificial intelligence models for diagnosing post-traumatic stress disorder
